description: The ferry operator issued the warning after the collapse of St Malo's only stevedore company.
title: Condor Ferries warns of Channel Islands service disruption
title_page: Condor Ferries warns of Channel Islands service disruption - BBC News
maintext: He said: "There is an awful irony in that having not been able to operate any high-speed passenger services for four months due to Covid, we could conceivably see a resumption from Guernsey and Jersey this summer affected by industrial action in St Malo, causing delays and cancellations."
